name: Jordan Blake
persona: Jordan Blake is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who has struggled significantly in their coursework, reflected by a very low CGPA. Jordan tends to have low motivation and self-discipline, often finding it difficult to stay focused or set meaningful academic goals. Despite not feeling much test anxiety, Jordan's lack of perseverance and belief in their own abilities has hindered their progress. They may benefit from academic support and mentorship to help develop stronger study habits and motivation.
